description:
College Writing Essentials is extremely valuable to anyone attending college or preparing to enroll after a long absence from high school. Since college writing classes cost thousands of dollars, you surely do not want to fail your writing courses. Join College Writing Essentials to boost your essay writing skills and impress your future English instructors!

Get a good foundation for successful college writing. Learn tips and techniques on how to write college essays. What you learn in this course will also carryover to research papers and standardized tests.

Course Topics:

College Writing Basics:

  • The Writing Process
  • How to Write Thesis Statements
  • How to Type APA Format
  • How to Type MLA Format
  • Recognizing Plagiarism
  • Avoiding Plagiarism
  • How to Write an Argument
title: College Writing Essentials
